about_the_game: 🐦 Fly as a bird. 🪶 Collect feathers. 🖼️ Unlock bird Kingfisher photos. 🙂 Fly and enjoy! Free demo contains 1 game level. Buy a full game to unlock more levels and more photos. Also full version save collected feathers.
detailed_description: 🐦 Fly as a bird. 🪶 Collect feathers. 🖼️ Unlock bird Kingfisher photos. 🙂 Fly and enjoy! Free demo contains 1 game level. Buy a full game to unlock more levels and more photos. Also full version save collected feathers.
name: Bird Feather: Aquamarine World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 / AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 375 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 🐦 Fly as a bird. 🪶 Collect feathers. 🖼️ Unlock bird Kingfisher photos. 🙂 Fly and enjoy! Free demo contains 1 game level. Buy a full game to unlock more levels and more photos. Also full version save collected feathers.
